headline: Employers prepare for disruptive and transformative health plan changes, WTW survey finds
summary: Initiatives are broad, encompassing vendor management, program and reimbursement reviews, alternative plan designs, increased governance and moreNEW YORK, Sept. 22, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Companies plan to evaluate disruptive changes to their healthcare plans as the cost of healthcare in the U.S. rises to the highest point in over two decades, according to a new survey by WTW (NASDAQ: WTW), a leading global advisory, broking and solutions company.
